reviewText: I find it inconvenient and distracting to have to return back to My Video Library every 20 minutes to proceed to the next episode.....even if it could function as a disc and  several episodes would play  continuously would be helpful.

My husband recommend this series and it was surprisingly good. What's weird is that I actually tried to watch this series when it was on air and didn't think it was that good.  However, now that my brain is no longer consumed with images of "Elaine from Seinfeld," I can actually enjoy this actress in other roles.  I'm really glad I gave this a chance because I laughed and laughed and laughed.  Give it a try, you won't be disappointed. Very funny!

Yet another great season of New Adventures of Old Christine!!! I cannot believe those idiots at CBS canceled this show after five seasons.  I guess crappy Reality shows are alot cheaper to produce.  Anyway, Season Five is another terrific season and if you love Julia Louis-Dreyfuss like I do, you will LOVE all five seasons.  I believe Season 2 is still the best season, but all five are great!!
This is the Best of the Best Season so far. You will literally be Laughing Out Loud as you watch episode after episode of Julia Louis Dreyfus. She just gets funnier and funnier as the years go on.
Funny
A great laugh out loud season!  Such a shame it was the last!  But VEEP is waiting for you after this series!!!
I like it.
I laugh whenever I watch the show.

I DON'T KNOW WHERE I HAVE BEEN BUT I'M JUST LEARNING THAT THIS SITCOM HAS BEEN OUT SENSE 2010!  THE FUNNIEST SITCOM EVER!!!!! I CAME ACROSS IT NUST A FEW MONTHS AGO 8/2016 ON TVLAND WHERE THEY ONLY PUT OUT OLDER SITCOMS I WAS TRULY CONFUSED I THOUGHT WHY IS THIS NEW SITCOM ON THIS CHANLE AND IT ONLY COMES ON IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT!  THIS IS WHAT IM GOING TO TAKE FROM IT ONE IS MY MOM IS BED BOUND AT A VERY YOUNG AGE  AND WE ARE ALWAYS LOOKING FOR SOMETHING FUNNY TO WATCH AND NOW A DAYS YOU CANT FIND NOTHING BUT DARK DEPRESSING SHOWS ON TV ANYMORE!! I HAVE BEEN TRULY BLESSED TO FIND THE OLD NEW CHRISTIAN!!!! SO I AM GOING TO  SURPRISE MY MOM AND. BUY ALL THE 5  SEASON'S !!! SHE KNOWS NOTHING ABOUT THE SHOW AND IM GOING TO BUY IT FOR HER BIRTHDAY I CANT WAIT FOR  HER TO SIT DOWM WITH ME WITH SOME POPCORN AND START WATCHING IT. THIS WILL GET USE THROUGH THE WINTER . THE WHOLE CAST IS HILARIOUS !!!! WE JULIA LEWIS DREYFUS!!!!!!
Love Julia Louis-Dreyfus!! She is at her best in this show!! This is my show I watch after the kids are asleep, constant laughs. Love Love Love!!
This is one of the funniest shows I have ever watched. I think it was way before its time and maybe too honest for TV!
love it so much.  JLD is great!!!!
love love love this show
Funny, funny, funny! I streamlined all 5 seasons to take with me to my cabin this summer. I hated for series to end. Now I plan to streamline "Veep" on my next trip.
Love this show. JLD is just a fantastic comedienne and ensemble perfect.
Love it!
It is hilarious.
I just love this show, this is one of the best comedies ever created.
Hilarious!
Very funny
good
Excellent!!!!! thanks
It's hilarious and genius writing.  You can see that she is not just Elaine Bennis from Seinfeld.  A whole new Christine is believed!
I love this show just wish it was still on

Why this show was canceled is totally beyond me. Hysterical and wonderfully done, it had so many more seasons possible.  How sad Julia Louise-Dreyfus moved from this to VEEP, which doesn't suit her well.
I'll always remember her as a Seinfeld character.
THE VERY BEST SERIES EVER!!!!!!!!
This show is so incredibly funny. Our DVD order came in a flash and in perfect condition. We are super happy!
Great series!! - recommend.
I think this show is hilarious and watch the episodes over and over
This is my favorite show
Love this whole series, very funny and I love all the characters.
Love this show very funny!!
Love this show
Good Service and Price.
HILARIOUS.  I watch this series over and over again.
Excellent service! Loved the item; will buy from again; many thanks!
Funniest show ever!
Laughter is the medicine! Here is to your health!
Funny

This show is so funny in an unpredictable sort of way. It's like your goofy friend that you never know what is going to come out of their mouth. I love Julia Louis-Drefus so I'm kinda biased but if your looking for a slightly inappropriate (in a good way) goofy, light hearted comedy show then this one is for you!
One of the greatest shows ever!!!
Well I haven"t seen the hole fifth season but the few I did see was really good especially the episodes with Eric Mccourmack as Max and Blare Underwood as Mr Harris.
Very witty and funny.
DITTO IT'S GREAT
Love the series. My Favorite Tv Show.
Super funny contunied
Hilarious!
Funny show.
Overall, the show is great, but it peaked at the third season. In my opinion, this one was the least funny and didn't do the Christine character any favours.
Love this set.
My husband and I love this show. It is a shame that they stopped it at season 5. SEasons 3 to 5 are so expensive but I looked EVERYWHERE for weeks and amazon was the best price.
Great quality video even thought its a DVD R!! Hope it lasts a long time!
I absolutly love this show. I wish it had aired longer. So funny, great for a good belly laugh!
good price and speedy delivery
WOW!

I only "Hate It" because the last disc on here is not the final episodes of "Old Christine", but instead it is episodes of "NIGHT COURT"!!!  So now I don't have the final shows of "Old Christine" and unfortunately I waited to long before I opened the DVD's to play them and found this out, so now I can't return them!!!  I never did care for the show Night Court so why would I want any episodes of it? Especially since they don't belong in The New Adventures Of Old Christine!  Thanks for nothing Amazon!
Just loved this show so much, hating seeing it go off the air
No problems
Wonderful condition like the seller said. Love this t.v. show & was sorry to see it come to an end.
as described

What a surprise when I put the third disc in and it is several episodes of Night Court, not The New Adventures of Old Christine. Refund!!!

Caveat: make sure you check all three discs -- glad I caught this within the 30-day refund period.
Love the show, wanted a few episodes from a few seasons, I love being able to download and watch at my leisure.

I think Julia Louis-Dreyfus is the funniest comedienne on TV. I love the whole Old Christine series. The show itself is awesome, but I was disappointed that the last 2 or 3 minutes of the very last episode wouldn't play. It just freezes. I ended up streaming the last episode just to watch the last scene!
wife loves this show and it makes a great gift as a collectible for her library of videos. Great deal
Love the show  its really funny can relate to some of  the story lines the actors are really funny awesome

I had been obsessed with racing home from work to watch reruns of this show so decided I just should buy the whole kit and caboodle and watched it obsessively, to the point where I began to tire of the characters and themes....guess that was the idea as I am now Christine Free lol  WAs a fun journey at times - never like her boyfriends but the brother and the catty perfect parents were fun, oh yeh, and her neat ex.  I think I like her best in this series, ironically insecure and unlucky as a female lead.

So sad this was last season of show. I think it could've gone on for several more years with the LOL factor! Would've loved to see more of Lyndsay and Marlee. I think they should've gotten a spin off show.

It was on my wish list for over a year. Amazon wanted top dollar for it. I had already bought the other four seasons for my wife but they just didn't want to give a price break on this, then wham. It went on sale about three weeks before christmas and I jump on it. My wife just loves these DVDs. I'm glad her collection is now complete.
that this is off the air and things like 2.5 Men, American Idol are still on.  America is going down the crapper when a show like this gets cancelled!  BRING IT BACK!

What a great series.  Louis_Dreyfus is the funniest actress around and she and Wanda Sykes, in particular, have tremendous comedy chemistry.  the entire ensemble is great and the writing is sharp and funny.  I watch this series over and over, whenever I need a pick me up.
Great fun!
The fifth season, is still funny.  Old Christine is just as self centered as before.  Wanda Sykes just keeps growing in character.
This series is great! I'm glad I purchased it. It arrived early and in excellent condition. I highly recommend this DVD series for anyone that liked the show. Plenty of laughs.
Too bad this show is not still on the air.  Julia and company are great together and they are all so funny!  Each of these seasons is hilarious!

I love Old Christine, and I bought the last 3 seasons on DVD (I already had the other 2) I already knew they were just DVD-R
But they don't have subtitles, or closed captioned.
And the presentation is pretty cheap (I don't care about this that much)
But reality is I want to watch this show with non english speakers or hearing impaired, and now I own it on DVD but I HAVE to watch it by myself, and if I want to share it I have to watch it on TV with subtitles, that's just stupid.
If you are going to sell me DVDs like this, (with nothing) make them cheaper paying 90+ bucks for the last 3 seasons is just way to expensive, the first two seasons are cheaper, presentation is better and have everything a DVD needs.
Great show, cheap treatment to it.
Wish they kept making it! It's one of my all time favourite shoes, love Julia Louis Dreyfus and the whole cast
An extremely funny series that is mind boggling expensive.
This should still be on the air but at least we got six years of this very funny show. Highly recommended.
I love this show.  It is a shame they took it off the air after 5 seasons.  It is so funny.  I would recommend this show to everyone who loves comedy!
This show, like Seinfeld, is always funny no matter how manly times I've seen it.  It is witty and creatively funny.
I love this show! i wish it had more episodes! Funny, funny, funny! I hate this show is off the air!
I buy this series for a show to watch as I do the treadmill. I laugh out loud as I walk away. Pure enjoyment. I love all the characters and it is just a simply funny show.
I bought the entire series because it was so funny. The ensemble was good at playing off each other. And it's the first show I've watched that the child actor was truly real and adorable.

I am very dissatisfied with this product, as it does not play continuously through.  There are NO marks or scratches on any of the disc, they just won't play through.  The first 2 episodes on each one will play and then the disc starts making noise and returns back to the beginning episode.

Never had any problems with the first 4 seasons, and I'm very upset about this!!  I would like a refund or a set that I CAN WATCH!!!

Though it's a short season, it's still as funny as it ever was. Each episode had me laughing out loud. The characters are a bit more cynical, the tone of its comedy got a little darker and the topics always hilarious. I noticed some poor follow-up in the story between episodes and it seems sad that the last episode was not about closure at all. But all in all, really funny and entertaining.
This show has me laughing, I think it has been cancelled which is a shame because I was really enjoying it

Full of laughter and funny moments! I absolutely love watching this show. It's funny to see all the situations Christine gets into and how she rationalizes a way (though it will likely be different than anyone else would come up with) to get out of them.

I loved this show while it was on and was very disappointed when it was cancelled.  I continue to laugh at every episode no matter how many times I see it.  It will always be one of my favorites.  What was the network thinking?
Great entertainment! Lots of laughs!  What tv should provide in this depressing world!  I wish this show was still on tv!

Every episode I have seen of The New Adventures of Old Christine makes me literally laugh out loud! Those from the 5th season are no exception. We all need something to make us just sit back and laugh and this will definitely do it!
love it. HD quality. complete episodes. plus it has subtitles! . it arrived on time as well. packaging was good. i totally love it. didn't regret it at all.
I never watched this show when it was on TV. When they had some reruns I really liked it. I just wished they had a better ending for the final season.
She's funnier in this show than she was on Seinfeld. Much enjoyment.
What a spectacular comedy series.  It should be a crime that it was cancelled. Old Christine is hilarious. I can watch all 5 seasons over and over again, and never get tired!
I love this show!

I'm sad, this was the last season of this great, adult comedy. We've watched Christine( J.L-D), push herself up one more step, only to be bounced down two, maybe three steps. But, she NEVER stops trying, the under-dog we all pull for- the one who isn't the brightest crayon in the
box!! The rest of the cast of actors, just rounded this show out to perfection ( all of them more like Christine, than they choose to admit)!!
Love this show!
Two of the funniest actors ever on this bit series. I watch this show over and over. I can't believe this was ever canceled!
LOVE THE DVDS VERY FUNNY!
Great
Cannot say enough great things about the show and Julia. Wanda Sykes is also hilarious. Just love so much. They should've kept making this show
Can't believe I'm done watching all the seasons.  A new fan of old Christine.  Hope Julia LD and Wanda Sykes do something else together.  Hilarious!!
Funny show you will not be disappointed
My only negative comment is that there are not more seasons, great comedy
